title: Sweetcorn Bean and Avocado Dip
ingredients: ['2 avocados, peeled, pitted and diced', '1 1/3 (410g) tins black beans, drained and rinsed', '1 1/2 (198g) tins sweetcorn, drained', '1 medium onion, finely chopped', '185g salsa', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh coriander', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '2 tablespoons chilli powder', 'salt and pepper to taste']
